instead.

GotoItem parsing regression (Close #161)

Fix regression in menu action parsing caused GotoItem default to NextItem
instead.

commit.message:
Add -s/--xrm-set to pekwm_ctrl

Add command to set the active X reosurces to pekwm_ctrl.

Example usage:

pekwm_ctrl --xrm-set resource1=value1 resource2=value=2

Updated plux scripts for shell_hook_init usage.

verification.payload:
tree 05210d83c34729cc69c1d693db5f6220e196ee8d
parent 5996263bb5739ca4a7c05d182732eae7a997517d
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676565533 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676918713 +0100

Add -s/--xrm-set to pekwm_ctrl

Add command to set the active X reosurces to pekwm_ctrl.

Example usage:

pekwm_ctrl --xrm-set resource1=value1 resource2=value=2

Updated plux scripts for shell_hook_init usage.

commit.message:
pekwm_lock.sh: Add simple wrapper for xlock/xscreensaver-command

Simple wrapper, allows keybindings etc to be the same between machines
independent of available software.

GNOME/KDE/XFCE etc counterparts should be detected and handled.

verification.payload:
tree ce65e22adc83e9bf1d3df2cd704328552b36b2dc
parent 504c14f0994aaa6811e1bc0e6f33fafe5e6c6f9e
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676204639 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676232081 +0100

pekwm_lock.sh: Add simple wrapper for xlock/xscreensaver-command

Simple wrapper, allows keybindings etc to be the same between machines
independent of available software.

GNOME/KDE/XFCE etc counterparts should be detected and handled.

commit.message:
pekwm_toggle_kbd_layout.sh script

Simple script capable of toggling and resetting the keyboard layout, used in
the default keybindings and to be used in the pekwm_lock.sh screensaver
wrapper.

pekwm_toggle_kbd_layout.sh script

Simple script capable of toggling and resetting the keyboard layout, used in
the default keybindings and to be used in the pekwm_lock.sh screensaver
wrapper.

commit.message:
pekwm_dialog: improve text formatting and -D option

Support splitting text provided to pekwm_dialog on newline and escaped
newlines \n.

Double the vertical around the title.

Add -D/--decorations option to request disabling titlebar and/or border
of the dialog window.

verification.payload:
tree 0a99e01275b4bdd680bcfdfce5a7973e861f67d5
parent 89d7e3a9a0096ba86311d0048b80a845f0deab53
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676203386 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1676232080 +0100

pekwm_dialog: improve text formatting and -D option

Support splitting text provided to pekwm_dialog on newline and escaped
newlines \n.

Double the vertical around the title.

Add -D/--decorations option to request disabling titlebar and/or border
of the dialog window.

commit.message:
Add PadAdapt to themes, default for version > 2.

Set true to adjust vertical padding so that the font gets centered,
requires HeightAdapt to be false if set on a decoration.

New default if theme Version is greater than 2.

verification.payload:
tree e89eb08742cfa2403d61a824e70d7226dfa03dc4
parent dd7b96cdcc6e0430b8f737a6fc5287f476476a85
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675372653 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675454956 +0100

Add PadAdapt to themes, default for version > 2.

Set true to adjust vertical padding so that the font gets centered,
requires HeightAdapt to be false if set on a decoration.

New default if theme Version is greater than 2.

commit.message:
Use NULL for exec* functions, fixes compilation on FreeBSD

exec* is C, so should use C style NULL and not nullptr (which isn't really
C++11 nullptr anyway).

Should fix compilation on FreeBSD, reported by Natacha in #pekwm.

verification.payload:
tree 96e856e843ea5cd4d622dad0f48e2a597aeeb63d
parent 7db4f506ecf89f8e25fb5ffb5f553d41ac253dcd
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675372985 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675406049 +0100

Use NULL for exec* functions, fixes compilation on FreeBSD

exec* is C, so should use C style NULL and not nullptr (which isn't really
C++11 nullptr anyway).

Should fix compilation on FreeBSD, reported by Natacha in #pekwm.

commit.message:
pekwm_panel: fix rendering using PangoCairo after xrandr event

Text rendering got corrupted using PangoCairo keeping the surface between
draws after a randr event was received.

Re-create the rendering surface for each render instead.

verification.payload:
tree 81fe73936959fd6f990e3959e11890ca185a0e8e
parent 7b3e20f0858bf8916c8818a49846706230b50527
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675028484 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675028553 +0100

pekwm_panel: fix rendering using PangoCairo after xrandr event

Text rendering got corrupted using PangoCairo keeping the surface between
draws after a randr event was received.

Re-create the rendering surface for each render instead.

commit.message:

to change window focus.

pekwm_panel: get updated client list on start

Fix order during startup ensuring ClientList gets rendered without having
to change window focus.

commit.message:
pekwm_panel: set PEKWM_CONFIG_PATH in environment

If starting pekwm_panel before pekwm (or from the same parent) the
PEKWM_CONFIG_PATH environment variable was not set which could cause icons
not to load as it was used to construct the image search path.

verification.payload:
tree 38a380ab665b01d912b2806cbe010918d2ee68f7
parent 808816620e244e5654889d43762957c1fb847a32
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675012142 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1675012142 +0100

pekwm_panel: set PEKWM_CONFIG_PATH in environment

If starting pekwm_panel before pekwm (or from the same parent) the
PEKWM_CONFIG_PATH environment variable was not set which could cause icons
not to load as it was used to construct the image search path.

commit.message:
X11 font name detection with alignment/options fix

Noted by okraits in #pekwm, X11 font detection not working when
aligment was set on font. Delay font detection until after type
parsing has been done.

verification.payload:
tree 85c9b90ed8d911b8617d2e041d05f8813c34444b
parent 4c475c2c8d141401a9716f08142722fc7a9173dd
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1674841440 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1674841440 +0100

X11 font name detection with alignment/options fix

Noted by okraits in #pekwm, X11 font detection not working when
aligment was set on font. Delay font detection until after type
parsing has been done.

commit.message:
Use XDBE for pekwm_panel and pekwm_dialog for a bit less flickering

okraits in #pekwm noted that pekwm_panel ClientList widget was flickering
when active client was changed. The use of the double buffering extension
should remedy this making the visual experience a bit smoother.

verification.payload:
tree af1ae1ba2101a54ac4f619e15bac462710016836
parent 793780bfa955c279b8d4b564f969fe5465118e8d
author Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1674666963 +0100
committer Claes Nästén <pekdon@gmail.com> 1674666963 +0100

Use XDBE for pekwm_panel and pekwm_dialog for a bit less flickering

okraits in #pekwm noted that pekwm_panel ClientList widget was flickering
when active client was changed. The use of the double buffering extension
should remedy this making the visual experience a bit smoother.

commit.message:
Fix RenderSurface geometry used in pekwm_dialog (Cairo font rendering)

Invalid geometry caused the Pango Cairo rendering to not output as the
requests was outside the surface region.

(+ sneak in some lost theme and test changes)

tree 510299dda7890f9e4c1eba6935821a1eb97d5108

Fix RenderSurface geometry used in pekwm_dialog (Cairo font rendering)

Invalid geometry caused the Pango Cairo rendering to not output as the
requests was outside the surface region.

(+ sneak in some lost theme and test changes)

commit.message:
Add Empty PFont type.

Simple PFont type without any rendering or size requests, use instead of
actually loading a font when specifying Empty in the theme.

Add Empty PFont type.

Simple PFont type without any rendering or size requests, use instead of
actually loading a font when specifying Empty in the theme.
